text: Ani amhi havela sulemanacya adhina kele ki sakalaci majala tici eka mahin'yaci rahata ase ani sandhyakalaci majala dekhila ani amhi tyancyasathi tambyaca jhara pravahita kela ani tyancya palanakartyacya adesane kahi jinna dekhila, je tyancya tabyata rahuna tyancyajavala kama karita asata ani tyancyapaiki jo koni amacya adesaci avajna karita ase, amhi tyala bhadakatya agicya azaba (sikse) ci godi cakhavita asu
